summary.para: Enables hosting of ASP.NET pages outside the Internet Information Services (IIS) application. This class enables the host to create application domains for processing ASP.NET requests.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object CreateApplicationHost (Type hostType, string virtualDir, string physicalDir);

summary.para: Creates and configures an application domain for hosting ASP.NET.

returns.para: An instance of a user-supplied class used to marshal calls into the newly created application domain.

Docs.param: The name of a user-supplied class to be created in the new application domain.
The virtual directory for the application domain; for example, /myapp.
The physical directory for the application domain where ASP.NET pages are located; for example, c:\mypages.
